item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Chebyshev approximation calculator (open source web app) (113 points | 16 comments)
2. Experimental web browser optimized for rabbit-holing (359 points | 76 comments)
3. NumPy QuadDType: Quadruple Precision for Everyone – Labs (6 points | 1 comment)
4. Show HN: A tool for creating chord charts on the go (56 points | 18 comments)
5. Meta Movie Gen (295 points | 229 comments)
6. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (625 points | 266 comments)
7. Show HN: kew – A Terminal Music Player for Linux (43 points | 15 comments)
8. ESP8266 Analog Broadcast Television Interface (13 points | 3 comments)
9. Reverse Engineering and Dismantling Kekz Headphones (119 points | 23 comments)
10. Show HN: A pretty decent PDF to CSV converter (13 points | 3 comments)
11. Nowadays (YC S23) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer ( | hide)
12. Why Is the Speed of Light So Fast? (Part 1) (38 points | 36 comments)
13. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (297 points | 25 comments)
14. C64 OS Programmer's Guide (52 points | 6 comments)
15. The Nobel-, Emmy-winning genius who became Google's star antitrust witness (11 points | 11 comments)
16. Were RNNs all we needed? (418 points | 206 comments)
17. Can we cut the AI Agent for X thing already (11 points | 5 comments)
18. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (1168 points | 344 comments)
19. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (249 points | 138 comments)
20. Self-locking and stiffening deployable tubular structures (5 points | discuss)
21. The Silk Road (2023) (48 points | 7 comments)
22. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (186 points | 57 comments)
23. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (860 points | 624 comments)
24. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (84 points | 23 comments)
25. Waymo and Hyundai enter multi-year, strategic partnership (42 points | 20 comments)
26. Holocron is an object storage based leader election library (19 points | 1 comment)
27. Apple Depth Pro: Sharp Monocular Metric Depth in Less Than a Second (18 points | 3 comments)
28. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (78 points | 16 comments)
29. Some Automattic employees accept severance package offer (199 points | 217 comments)
30. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (283 points | 165 comments)
